title: Baked Nachos with Ranchitas Nacho queso
instructions: Step 2. On a flat baking tray, place parchment paper. Spread out the Ranchitas Nacho Cheese. Sprinkle cheese on top and add all the toppings except the olives, scallions, guacamole, and sour cream. Sprinkle more cheese on top and bake for 10 minutes.
Step 3. Add the remaining toppings and serve.
description: Baked nachos with multiple layers of melted cheese and toppings. An irresistible recipe with Ranchitas Nacho Queso.
